name: Lost Light (ZeroBomb)
description:
Please enjoy the first game that ZEROBOMB, the Korean indie game development team, made for a year and a half.

The game currently only supports Korean.

This scenario is a fictional reconstruction based on a true story.

Set in the Japanese colonial era, you are helping the Korean Independence Army. Rendezvous with the Korean independence forces and help their cause.

Hide from the guards and assassinate them when given the chance. Contact the independence forces in secret, obtain information, and steal supplies from the Imperial Japanese army.

◎ Controls!

move : Point and click with mouse

Q : whistle - Attract the enemy to where the main character is.

W : Spying - Take a peek at the invisible space on the map.

E: Assassination - Kill the enemy when behind their backs.

R: Carry corpses - Carry the bodies of dead enemies and dispose of them.

Space Bar : Hide/Open

We always welcome your feedback.
